title: S5 Ep48: Climate and debt
itunes:title: Climate and debt
description: Mitigating and adapting to climate change is economically rational. But it is also expensive, it’s not clear how the cost should be financed, or which countries or actors assume the burden. The 25th Geneva Report from CEPR investigates these questions. Beatrice Weder di Mauro and Ugo Panizza tell Tim Phillips about the report’s conclusions.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
